title: Pixel freezing randomly and youtube not playing sometimes
content:
I am having weird issues with Pixel. Youtube videos use to not play sometimes. It just shows a single snapshot and never works. After multiple restarts, sometimes it would work. Once it starts working it works fine till next reboot. 

I thought maybe it was space issue or some app causing it. So i did a factory reset. Kept getting same issue. 

And now, after a week randomly the screen flashes, becomes very bright and the phone just hangs. The only option i have is it do a hard reboot. 

Anyone else faced similar issues? 

Have tried multiple factory resets and nothing works. Running out of any ideas.
